comments: The values (a(n),x(n)), n >= 2, x(n)=Fibonacci(2*n+2)*Fibonacci(2*n+3), are the integer solutions (a,x) of the equation binomial(x+1,a+1) + binomial(x+2,a+1) = binomial(x+3,a+1). - Klaus Strassburger (strass(AT)ddfi.uni-duesseldorf.de)
references: H. Harborth, Fermat-like binomial equations, Applications of Fibonacci numbers, Proc. 2nd Int. Conf., San Jose, California, August 1986, 1-5 (1988).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
S. M. Tanny and M. Zuker, On a unimodal sequence of binomial coefficients, Discrete Math. 9 (1974), 79-89.
